channel.title: Blank Layout on Monochrome
channel.description: Recent content in Blank Layout on Monochrome

item.title: Blank Layout Document
item.description: Blank layout render only the content of _index.md, it’s useful for fully customizing your list layout. This layout can only be used on section page (_index.md). Configuration --- type: 'blank' --- Specify type in front-matter will change the template lookup order.
